Introduction
This topic contains information on the action to take when IVAP is uncertain, including
deferments in pension cases
handling a deferment in pension cases
Parents’ DIC cases where the claimant is unable to predict income
action to take when the Social Security rate reported by the beneficiary is different than the Social Security rate in the Veterans Benefits Management System (VBMS)
analyzing Federal tax information (FTI)
action to take when income reported on the application is different than FTI found in Share
handling unreliable income reporting
process for handling development notices containing FTI
considering FTI on grants of pension based on liberalizing law
time allowed for completion of data exchange for the Internal Revenue Service (IRS)/Social Security Administration (SSA)
, and
handling FTI when the claimant is eligible for the $90 Medicaid nursing home rate
.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section A - General Information on the Effect Income and Net Worth Have on Pension and Parents’ Dependency and Indemnity Compensation (DIC)
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section A
